subject: Physics
title: Efficiency and Modern Propulsion Systems
description: Learn about specific impulse, efficiency, and advanced propulsion technologies.

content.text: Modern rocketry focuses on improving fuel efficiency through advanced propulsion.

content.heading: Isp Example
content.problem: A rocket has thrust = 3000 N, mass flow = 1 kg/s, g₀ = 9.81. Find Isp.
